mapper.insert: insert into project(pid, pname, category, start, end, intro, district) values (#{pid}, #{pname}, #{category}, #{start}, #{end}, #{intro}, #{district})
insert into manage_project_part(part_pk, pid, part) values (#{part_pk}, #{pid}, #{part})
insert into recruit_project(pid, title, rcstart, rcend) values (#{pid}, #{title}, #{rcstart}, #{rcend})
